title: Talk Tennis
cleaned_text: I have Teal Diadem Elevate Tour and it's a good frame but I feel like I'm missing something. You (or someone you were talking to) said you added lead tape to handle and head, how much was added?? I feel like when I add weight I don't find the right combo and it just feels heavy! Might sell my 2 newish frames and very nice matching bag if I don't get it right
